title: ISic002924. I.Sicily inscription 002924
body:
1 + Sepultura man-
2cipiorum Palum-
3bae relicta q (uon) d (am)
4 Hirinei +

1+SEPULTURAMAN
2CIPIORUMPALUM
3BAERELICTAQD
4HIRINEI+
